Minced meat pie, or simply mince pie 
is a traditional British dessert,

typically eaten at Christmas time. It 
contains dried fruit, spices, and Brandy,

and is usually topped with custard. Yum! It 
has this name. Not because it contains beef,

but actually for, because the filling 
looks a little bit like mincemeat.
